com.rath.rathbot.disc

Class InfractionData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rath.rathbot.disc.InfractionData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class InfractionData
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class holds a user's entire infraction history.
    Author:
    Tim Backus tbackus127@gmail.com
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public final void mute(long issueTime,
                       int muteDuration,
                       java.lang.String reason)
        Sets a user's muted status to true and increments the mute count.
        Parameters:
        issueTime - the epoch time the user was muted.
        muteDuration - the amount of seconds the user is muted for.
        reason - the reason the user is being muted.
